Articles.Content:
Apparently, trying to recreate the Star trek Solar slingshot maneuver to go back in time....will umm...make even the mightiest computer crash XD

I got up to about 89,000Km/s before system wide meltdown >\_< XDD ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Well what did you expect from your motherboard when you try to make it calculate back in time?

Well...with it being an 8 core 4.2ghz overlocked rig with 16gigs of 1,600 rams....

Alot 8)
Hehe, still, no matter how much computer power you can\'t change the past. :3
